Package jparsec.astrophysics

Classes to operate with measurements and spectra in astrophysics.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FluxElement
    This class holds each point in a spectra or SEDs.
    HRDiagram
    This class allows to work with HR diagrams and to fit or calibrate those coming from observations of star clusters.
    IRAMPdBI
    A class to perform some useful calculations on IRAM instruments.
    MeasureElement
    The most simple representation of a measure: a value, its error, and the unit.
    PCAElement
    A class to hold the results of a PCA (Principal Component Analysis) calculation.
    SingleDish
    Provides useful calculations for single dish antennas.
    Spectrum
    This class holds data like spectra or SEDs.
    Table
    A handy class to manipulate 1d/2d/3d tables with measures, including errors and a mask of pixels within calculations, optionally.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SingleDish.TELESCOPE
    The set of telescopes.

Package jparsec.astrophysics Description

Classes to operate with measurements and spectra in astrophysics.

This package contains classes to operate with scientific measurements and astrophysical spectra.
